00036 class SIM_API cProperty : public cNamedObject
00037 {
00038   public:
00039     static const char *DEFAULTKEY;
00040 
00041   private:
00042     enum {
00043       FL_ISLOCKED = 4,
00044       FL_ISIMPLICIT = 8,
00045     };
00046 
00047   protected:
00048     // property names, keys and values are all stringpooled to reduce memory consumption
00049     static cStringPool stringPool;
00050 
00051     cProperties *ownerp;
00052 
00053     const char *propindex;
00054     mutable const char *propfullname;
00055 
00056     typedef std::vector<const char *> CharPtrVector;
00057     CharPtrVector keyv;
00058     std::vector<CharPtrVector> valuesv;
00059 
00060   protected:
00061     static void releaseValues(CharPtrVector& vals);
00062     int findKey(const char *key) const;
00063     CharPtrVector& getValuesVector(const char *key) const;
00064 
00065   public:
00066     // internal: locks the object against modifications. It cannot be unlocked
00067     // -- one must copy contents to an unlocked object, or call dup()
00068     // (new objects are created in unlocked state).
00069     virtual void lock() {setFlag(FL_ISLOCKED, true);}
00070 
00071     // internal:
00072     virtual bool isLocked() const {return flags&FL_ISLOCKED;}
00073 
00074     // internal: set the containing cProperties
00075     virtual void setOwner(cProperties *p) {ownerp = p;}
00076 
00077   public:
00080 
00084     explicit cProperty(const char *name=NULL, const char *index=NULL);
00085 
00089     cProperty(const cProperty& other) {setFlag(FL_ISLOCKED,false); propindex=propfullname=NULL; operator=(other);}
00090 
00094     virtual ~cProperty();
00095 
00099     cProperty& operator=(const cProperty& other);
00101 
00108     virtual void setName(const char *name);
00109 
00113     virtual const char *getFullName() const;
00114 
00118     virtual cProperty *dup() const   {return new cProperty(*this);}
00119 
00123     virtual std::string info() const;
00124 
00128     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00129 
00133     virtual void parsimUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00135 
00142     virtual void setIndex(const char *index);
00143 
00150     virtual const char *getIndex() const;
00151 
00155     virtual void setIsImplicit(bool b);
00156 
00162     virtual bool isImplicit() const;
00163 
00168     virtual const std::vector<const char *>& getKeys() const;
00169 
00174     virtual bool containsKey(const char *key) const;
00175 
00180     virtual void addKey(const char *key);
00181 
00188     virtual int getNumValues(const char *key) const;
00189 
00198     virtual void setNumValues(const char *key, int size);
00199 
00205     virtual const char *getValue(const char *key, int index=0) const;
00206 
00216     virtual void setValue(const char *key, int index, const char *value);
00217 
00221     virtual void erase(const char *key);
00223 };
